item.title: comments on gender in modernity
item.description: “a day may soon come in which a healthy transexuality would be the norm” – Firestone There is a certain contradiction in transsexual discourse I’ve noticed. On one hand, gender is a social construct based on patriarchal power that ought to be abolished. On the other, gender is an unchangeable and a priori subjectivity in which ought to be accepted. A malleable social construction and a rigid authentic identity.
